text: Create a React component for a dashboard with charts and KPI cards
I'll create a dashboard component with chart widgets and KPI summary cards...
I'll create a dashboard component with chart widgets and KPI summary cards. The layout will use a responsive CSS grid.
Also add a date range picker for filtering the data
The user wants date filtering. I should add a date range picker component that controls the data fetched by the charts and KPI cards. I'll use a controlled component pattern.
I've added a DateRangePicker component that filters all dashboard data.

Dashboard component created at src/Dashboard.tsx with charts, KPI cards, and date filtering.
- [ ] Add export to CSV functionality
Next step: connect to the real API endpoints
